p: The results of several anonymous online surveys have indicated that the use of kratom products may be useful for the self-treatment of acute and chronic pain ( 23â€“ 25), and in fact, its use is only self-reported to be associated with few adverse effects. Findings from a recent clinical trial confirmed the analgesic properties of kratom in healthy volunteers lasting for approximately 2 h with average blood concentrations of mitragynine at 2,000 ng/mL ( 26). These results suggest that kratom has the potential to be used as a centrally acting herbal analgesic.
